thread.title: Minor girl raped: 15-year-old gets pregnant after being raped by her guardian in Karnataka | India News
thread.title_full: Minor girl raped: 15-year-old gets pregnant after being raped by her guardian in Karnataka | India News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Minor girl raped: 15-year-old gets pregnant after being raped by her guardian in Karnataka | India News
text:
KOPPAL: A 15-year-old girl student of a government school was allegedly raped by her guardian for the past several months following which she became pregnant, police said on Wednesday. 

Krishnappa, who works as a labourer in Basrikatte village of Karnataka 's Koppal district, along with his blind wife Shanthamma took custody of minor girl after she was abandoned by her biological parents. 

"Krishnappa, who is a drunkard, allegedly assaulted and raped the victim on several occasions. He had also threatened the victim of serious consequences if she complained about it," a senior police official said, adding that the girl is studying in class 7 in a local government school. 

It was only after the minor girl became pregnant, villagers approached the police and the investigations have been started, police said. 

"Krishnappa is a serial offender. He was earlier arrested for running an illegal slaughter house near his house," the police official said. 

Read this story in Kannada 

Courtesy: Vijay Karnataka
